Ya4 zhou1 Zu2 qiu2 Lian2 he2 hui4
Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4
Guo2 ji4 Zu2 qiu2 Lian2 he2 hui4

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.
sentences.chinese: 格洛开始赞助的非洲足球联合会非洲年度最佳球员。

sentences.english: A crowd of more than 84, 000 people attended the World Cup final at Soccer City Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 000多人观看了在足球城体育场举行的世界杯决赛。

sentences.english: It rained， therefore the football match was put off.
sentences.chinese: 天下雨，所以足球比赛延期了。

sentences.english: He is a greto football player, from all accounts.
sentences.chinese: 外传他是个很不了起的足球运带动。

sentences.english: Before I could answer, she had turned around and started back out onto the field.
sentences.chinese: 我还未来得及回话，她已经转身向足球场上走去了。

sentences.english: After the football match, the players turned in their uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 这场足球比赛之后，队员们把运动衣归还。

sentences.english: He is challenging for the coach in the Football Club.
sentences.chinese: 他正在竞选，争当足球俱乐部的教练。

sentences.english: Arnesen has been given the role of head talent scout, in charge of uncovering football talents.
sentences.chinese: 阿内森被任命为球探总管，负责发掘足球天才。

sentences.english: Football officiating is so subjective - much more subjective than any other sport.
sentences.chinese: 足球的判罚是如此的主观，比起其他运动要主观的多。

sentences.english: I'll try my best to rout out a good goalkeeper for our football team.
sentences.chinese: 我愿尽力为我们的足球队物色一位优秀的守门员。

sentences.english: What is your favourite soccer team?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢的足球队是哪一支？

sentences.english: Jimy and his friends are kicking football.
sentences.chinese: 杰姆正在和他的朋友们踢足球。

sentences.english: In football and death alternative choice, Harry Kewell chose the former.
sentences.chinese: 在足球和生死二选一上，科威尔选择了足球。

sentences.english: In football and death alternative choice, Harry Kewell chose the former.
sentences.chinese: 在足球和生死二选一上，科威尔选择了足球。

sentences.english: The football bounced off the goalpost.
sentences.chinese: 足球击中球门门柱弹了出去。

sentences.english: Real Madrid defender Gabriel Heinze has conceded he would be interested in playing Premier League football again.
sentences.chinese: 皇马后卫海因策已经承认他可以再次享受英超足球。

definition: to kick/to play (e.g. soccer)/(slang) butch (in a lesbian relationship)
football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
abbr. for 男子足球 men's soccer/abbr. for 男子足球隊|男子足球队 men's soccer team
